message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a small share, but I'm taking the majority. You can try to do better next round!
I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I'm still trying to get a good deal!
You're getting closer, but I'm not giving up yet. This is my best offer so far!
